attributes.action: Give us longer lunchtime in high-schools like another 30 minutes
attributes.additional_details: I want them to do it because people have been late on numerous occasions because of the short lunch and we should be given more time
attributes.background: I would want them to give us a longer lunch because it gives us time to get food and chill talk to our pals and let's us have a good time

rejection.details: Decisions about break times are a matter for schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
